Articles.Content: This is probably very simple. I don't know how, but is there away to export a texture of a picture on to the space suits of the kerbals? Do I need any special programs or anything?

Texture Replacer supports making custom suits, if that is what you are looking for: 

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107471-1-0-4-TextureReplacer-2-4-7-(4-7-2015)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107471-1-0-4-TextureReplacer-2-4-7-%284-7-2015%29)
